background: A hospital prepares batches of medication patches and anti-biotic creams, requiring different amounts of time and materials, with a requirement to have at least twice as many anti-biotic creams as medication patches, subject to time and material constraints.
constraints: Number of medication patches is non-negative
Number of anti-biotic creams is non-negative
Anti-biotic creams prepared must be at least twice the number of medication patches
At most MaxTotalBatches batches in total for medication patches and anti-biotic creams
Available staff time is at most TotalStaffTime minutes
Available materials are at most TotalMaterials units
objective: Maximize the number of people that can be treated with the batches of medication patches and anti-biotic creams
description: A hospital prepares batches of medication patches and anti-biotic creams. Each medication patch requires \param{TimeMedicationPatches} minutes to prepare and \param{MaterialsMedicationPatches} units of materials. Each anti-biotic cream requires \param{TimeAntiBioticCreams} minutes to prepare and \param{MaterialsAntiBioticCreams} units of materials. Since anti-biotic creams are used more often, there must be at least twice as many anti-biotic creams as medication patches. Due to storage reasons, the hospital can make at most \param{MaxTotalBatches} batches of medication patches and anti-biotic creams in total. The hospital has available \param{TotalStaffTime} minutes of staff to spare and \param{TotalMaterials} units of materials. If each batch of medication patches can treat \param{PeopleTreatedMedicationPatches} people and each batch of anti-biotic cream can treat \param{PeopleTreatedAntiBioticCreams} people, how many batches of each should be made to maximize the number of people that can be treated?

parameters.definition: Time required to prepare a batch of medication patches
Materials required to prepare a batch of medication patches
Time required to prepare a batch of anti-biotic creams
Materials required to prepare a batch of anti-biotic creams
Maximum total number of batches of medication patches and anti-biotic creams due to storage
Total staff time available for preparation
Number of people treated by a batch of medication patches
Number of people treated by a batch of anti-biotic creams
